location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.619 of 1820, from James Henderson, Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt from Henderson of Bruce's letter of 26 March 1820, discussing charges made by the Commander of the Malabar Country Ships for conveying the survivors of the Ariel, according to agreement entered into and passed by the Governor in Council.
